name: Galactic Mercenaries
overview: IN 2400 AD your home planet, Earth, was invaded by evil aliens. In order to save your planet you and a small crew take off in the only hyper-light space currently functioning on Earth. You set off to seek help to liberate your planet. Once you can find them, most planets are inhabited but they will require something before they will assist you. Search all planets as there are items to be collected for trading. Never give up hope as things can appear even after you have searched.
